--------------------
Text: Megaoryzomys curioi, also known as the Galápagos giant rat, is an extinct species of sigmodontine rodent, known only from Santa Cruz Island in the Galápagos Islands.

Triplets:
<Megaoryzomys curioi
1:
--------------------
Text: Megaoryzomys:  It likely met its demise when European settlers introduced invasive species to the island.

Triplets:<Megaoryzomys
3:
--------------------
Text: Megaoryzomys:  Its relationships are currently unclear; it has been placed in both Oryzomyini and Thomasomyini in the past.
